select cpp.post_id from chirp_product_post cpp
inner join chirp_member_collect cmc on cpp.post_id = cmc.collect_ref_id and cmc.collect_member_id = #{bo.memberId}
and cpp.product_id = #{cpp.productId}
and cpp.post_title like concat('%',#{bo.postTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and cpp.post_good = 1
and cpp.collect_type = 2
group by cpp.post_id order by cpp.post_top desc , cpp.post_hot desc , cpp.create_time desc
